In the past , Gingrich has been even more skeptical of the prospects of even negotiating with Iran , frequently threatening to use force against Tehran over its nuclear program and advocating regime change as the end goal for any military strike .
Experts have frequently commented on the inefficacy of a military strike in halting Iran 's nuclear program in comparison to diplomacy .
Back in 2009 , soon after Obama 's inauguration , Gingrich even compared negotiating with Iran 's leaders to negotiating with Adolf Hitler .
And one of Gingrich 's largest donors during his failed presidential bid in 2012 not only expressed skepticism over the talks , but suggested the use of a nuclear weapon against Iran .
